name: Shoulder Rotation
description: Rotate shoulders forward and backward with arms at sides

name: Knee Bends
description: Gentle knee bends while standing, 60 degree angle

name: Neck Stretches
description: Side to side neck stretches, 20 second hold each side

name: Ankle Circles
description: Rotate ankles clockwise and counterclockwise while seated

name: Wrist Flexor Stretch
description: Extend arm, pull fingers back gently with opposite hand
